Question
========

Below is the (incomplete) ANOVA table of a CRD-ANOVA (Completely Randomized Design ANOVA), which was performed on data that were collected from 16 individuals divided into 4 groups.

  --------------- ----- ---- ---- ----- Source of variation SS df MS F Among groups 8.0 Within groups 60 12 Total 180 --------------- ----- ---- ---- -----

For testing H~0~: μ~1~ = μ~2~ = μ~3~ = μ~4~ against H~1~: not all population averages are equal the F value from the ANOVA table is compared with the critical value from the F-distribution. At a risk of 5%, the conclusion should be

Answerlist
----------

* Critical value is 3.13, reject H0.
* Critical value is 3.49, do not reject H0.
* Critical value is 3.49, reject H0.
* Critical value is 8.74, do not reject H0.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Critical value is 3.13, reject H0...: Incorrect
* Critical value is 3.49, do not reject H0...: Incorrect
* Critical value is 3.49, reject H0...: Correct
* Critical value is 8.74, do not reject H0...: Incorrect
